attributes.action: create a sytem of fair and honest payments to Kinship Carers similar to those paid to Foster Carers so as to engender a position of parity between the two.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is estimated that there are around 200,000 children being raised by Family and Friends. Many of these children and their carers are faced with a lack of emotional, practical and financial support.  Carers and the children, want Recognition, Respect and Reward!

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to create a sytem of fair and honest payments to Kinship Carers similar to those paid to Foster Carers so as to engender a position of parity between the two.

Her Majesty's Government has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.hmg.gov.uk/epetition-responses/petition-view.aspx?epref=KinshipSupport



Her Majesty's Government
